title: NeuS-QA: Grounding Long-Form Video Understanding in Temporal Logic and Neuro-Symbolic Reasoning
summary: This paper addresses challenges in Long-Form Video Question Answering (LVQA) by proposing NeuS-QA, a framework that grounds long-form video understanding in temporal logic and neuro-symbolic reasoning. It aims to overcome limitations of current vision-language models in handling complex queries and multi-step temporal reasoning over long videos.
usefulness_reason: Score 70 assigned because the paper explicitly deals with "Long-Form Video Question Answering" and "multi-step temporal reasoning" over "long videos", which are strong indicators of both spatial (video content) and temporal aspects, making it highly relevant to "Spatio Temporal".
